snippets.zlayout: div.layout>(header>h2{cities}^section>(nav>ul>li*3>a{City $})>article>h1{London}>p{London is the capital city of England. It is the most populous city in the  United Kingdom, with a metropolitan area of over 13 million inhabitants.}>p{Standing on the River Thames, London has been a major settlement for two millennia, its history going back to its founding by the Romans, who named it Londinium.})>footer>p{Footer}
